report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: The Andariel gang is classified by the Korean Financial Security Institute as a subgroup of the Lazarus APT group. The group mainly attacks South Korean organizations, especially financial institutions, for financial gain and cyber espionage.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: Recently, the Red Raindrop team of Qi'anxin Threat Intelligence Center captured a batch of Andariel-related attack samples in daily threat hunting, all of which are PE executable files. According to the time when this batch of samples was uploaded to VT, it can be seen that the related attack activities have been launched since at least February this year.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: Attack samples can be divided into two categories: one is a loader that decrypts and loads subsequent payloads in memory, and the loaded content includes backdoors and browser stealing programs; the other is a downloader written in Go language, which sends back to the C2 server The collected host information then downloads the PE file and executes it. Most Go downloaders currently still have low single-digit detections on VT, which may be one reason why attackers choose Go to develop their malware.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: The information of malicious samples of the loader class captured this time is as follows.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: The downloader malicious sample information is as follows.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: Taking the sample 079b4588eaa99a1e802adf5e0b26d8aa as an example for analysis, the core functions of the loader are as follows.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: The API string and subsequent payloads are decrypted by the methods of the CryptoXor class in the program, and the decryption operation is completed by the function sub_140001220.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: The encrypted subsequent payload is placed at the end of the file, and is located by summing the length of the original file header and the length of each segment. Taking this sample as an example, the data of the last segment of the sample ends at 0x26800, and the 4 bytes starting from the file offset 0x26800 indicate the length of the subsequent payload, here is 0x41e00, followed by the encrypted payload.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: Subsequent payload decryption to obtain PE file

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: Call the function sub_140004AA0 to load and execute the PE file in memory.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: PE is a backdoor program, and DES decrypts three strings to obtain the IP address of the C2 server. The actual effective IP is 109.248.144.155, and the ports are 8443 and 8080.

report_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
chapter_title: Lazarus arsenal update: analysis of recent Andariel attack samples
text: The backdoor has 7 functions, each of which is implemented as a C++ class. The names of each class and the corresponding main functions are as follows.
